attributes.action: replace the use of internal photographs and measurements in private homes, for the purpose of calculating council tax dues, with requirement for external measurements only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Photography and internal inspections would be an infringement of human rights to privacy in the home and should be substituted with external measurements only, giving a building footprint on which to base the iniquitous tax.
It is time that our servants, both government and council, listened to our views.

rejection.details: There are several petitions on this theme already - please sign one of them instead
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
